title: Prestige Skins
body:
Hi guys,

Was wondering if there is a way to get these prestige skins faster then burning money, I spent $50 RP on getting project orbs and only have 300 points and need 2000 for Irelia which is insane. Any tips? Much appreciated thanks!

replies.body:
Play the game a lot, buy the pass.

Good luck.
Yup gonna take a while! Trying what you said now! Thanks for that :)
